title: The real meaning of words, numbers
description: I try not to burden readers with too many numbers. You've already made it through the news, you've done your duty as a citizen, you've read stories about wastewater treatment and banking regulation. You deserve fun. But I'm still having fun leafing through the Ashley County census, and delivering my findings requires me to report some numbers.

title: Union Budget 2026 Empowers Women and Youth Development
description: Presenting her ninth consecutive Union Budget, the Finance Minister underscored a continued commitment to empowering women and youth, highlighting initiatives aimed at securing their future. With a clear focus on inclusive development, the budget outlines several measures designed to support women’s advancement and youth opportunities, signaling the government’s ongoing emphasis on social equity and long-term [...]The post Union Budget 2026 Empowers Women and Youth Development appeared first on The CSR Journal.
